findings.title: Owner can pause / unpause contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to pause or unpause the contract at will.

findings.title: Owner can mint tokens (up to capitalization amount)
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to mint tokens up to a certain capitalization amount without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw hanging dividends
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw hanging dividends.

findings.title: Owner can finish mint forever
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to finish minting tokens indefinitely.

findings.title: No OwnershipTransferred event emitted on first setup of contract
findings.description: The contract does not emit an OwnershipTransferred event during its initial setup.
